ygData.subject: Screech failures?
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night, while I was fighting the cash-cow mob I ve mentioned before, I started to lose badly so I hit Screech (area effect fear) and waited, and waited,
ygData.messageBody:
Last night, while I was fighting the cash-cow mob I've
mentioned before, I started to lose badly so I hit Screech
(area effect fear) and waited, and waited, and waited, and
died. I did see the yellow glow form around the mob, but no
"flees in terror" message, no resist message.

Is it possible that some mobs are immune to fear?

And no, I'm still not telling what mob it is. :-) Their
spawn can't handle more than about 3 groups, and I don't want
Verant to nerf the loot on them.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
